name: hydrothermal
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to or produced by hot water, especially water that has been naturally heated under the ground: Our hypothesis was supported by the discovery of hydrothermal activity north of Iceland. There is no evidence of an imminent volcanic eruption or hydrothermal explosion.
More examplesFewer examplesThere's nothing unusual happening with the hydrothermal system.Areas of extensive hydrothermal alteration in Scottish granites have been investigated.In recent years, researchers have discovered that hydrothermal environments on Earth are rich in life.
